resources.string: Once an ancient cartographer of the world wrote the following letter to his fellow mate.The letter was encrypted from second line to avoid leakage of information. Decrypting the letter will lead you to the next satellite station."

string.name: ques8
string.b: I have end but no beginning, i have home but no rooms, i have keys but no lock!!!!!

resources.string:
1. This part of the event runs on the current Application platform.

2. Find out the locations using the hints provided. Volunteers at the location will enter next password if you convince them with the respective hint obtained.

3.Don't press back button or close the app. If you do so, it is your responsibility to collect passwords again from all the locations.

4. Any kind of malpractice is strictly prohibited and may lead to direct disqualification 

5. Please do have the receipt of event or confirmation mail of event with you which may be verified in event at any point of time.

Aavishkaar a student launched satellite has lost it's communication with base station.

The key to re-establish connection is in a black envelope which is hidden somewhere in space inside a mystery box!

To reach these box and envelope, you have to visit various satellite stations and complete tasks given by them.

Are you ready to help IEEE-RITB re-establish connection with it is satellite?

 what are you waiting for ?
Head to questionnaire round\n LHC Seminar hall 1
